message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $110. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested in the product but $110 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. Considering your feedback, I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer for the product is $95.
